sentences.en: A retrospective atmosphere pervaded the whole performance.
sentences.cn: 怀旧的气氛弥漫了整个演出。

sentences.en: A retrospective influence pervaded the whole performance.
sentences.cn: 怀旧的影响弥漫了整个演出.
对110名病人进行的回溯研究

sentences.en: A subsequent ratification has a retrospective affect, and be equivalent to a prior command.
sentences.cn: 事后假追认有溯及力, 等同先前命令.

sentences.en: Afterwards, retrospective fear of the responsibility would make her feel almost faint.
sentences.cn: 后来，回想起要负的责任她几乎会吓晕过去。

sentences.en: Bankers are quick to condemn retrospective tax legislation.
sentences.cn: 银行家们立即声讨有追溯效力的税收立法。

sentences.en: It's not everyone gets a retrospective exhibition in a Bond Street gallery.
sentences.cn: 不是每个人都可以在邦德街的画廊里面举办回顾画展的.

sentences.en: Methods a retrospective study of 28 cases diagnosis and treatment.
sentences.cn: 方法回顾性分析28例结直肠癌骨转移患者的临床资料.

sentences.en: Methods Retrospective collection of data from patient files and follow up.
sentences.cn: 方法:对病人资料和随访信息的回顾性整理.

sentences.en: Recall bias happened because the study was retrospective rather than prospective.
sentences.cn: 回忆偏见的发生由于这项研究是回顾性的而不是前瞻性的.

sentences.en: Study Design. Leel III retrospective series with historical controls.
sentences.cn: 研究设计: 有历史对照的III级回顾性病历资料.

sentences.en: The Law recognises the weakness of claims based on retrospective knowledge.
sentences.cn: 法律基于追溯效力的相关规定认定索赔证据不足。

sentences.en: The tax ruling has retrospective effect.
sentences.cn: 该税务裁定具有溯及力.

sentences.en: They honoured him with a retrospective exhibition in 1987.
sentences.cn: 他们在1987年为他举办了一次回顾展，以示敬意。

sentences.en: This document describes a procedure for conducting a project retrospective.
sentences.cn: 本文将阐述执行项目回顾的过程.

sentences.en: When a precedent is overruled the effect is retrospective.
sentences.cn: 先例被宣告无效时,其结果溯及既往.

words.tran_cn: 回顾的；怀旧的；可追溯的

phrases.tran_cn: 回顾性队列研究；回顾性队列调查

trans.tran_cn: 回顾的，怀旧的，[法]有追溯力的，可追溯的
trans.tran_en: related to or thinking about the past
a show of the work of an  artist  , actor,  film-maker  etc that includes examples of all the kinds of work they have done
